projects.title: AI-Powered Job Application Assistant
projects.description: Full-stack job application system with AI-powered resume tailoring using Next.js, FastAPI, and Claude/OpenAI
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive AI-powered job application assistant that automatically scrapes job listings, enriches them with company data, and uses LLMs to intelligently tailor resumes while maintaining authenticity. Features multi-source job scraping, company enrichment via Proxycurl, LangChain-powered resume customization, and automated PDF generation using JSON Resume standard.
projects.contribution: Architected three-tier system, implemented LLM integration with validation layers, built job scraping pipeline, created CLI tools with Rich library, designed PostgreSQL schema with JSONB support, integrated multiple APIs (JobSpy, Proxycurl, Claude, OpenAI)
